com.msgilligan.bitcoinj.test

Interface FundingSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegTestFundingSource

    public interface FundingSource

    A source of Bitcoin funds for testing

    In RegTest mode, it can be a RegTestFundingSource that mines coins in RegTest mode and sends them to a requesting address. In other modes it can be a TestWallet preloaded with a certain amount of coins.
